name: minimalistic-blog-template
title: minimalistic blog template
article:
minimalistic but opinionated blog template. Aims to be super easy to deploy and use, with a focus on performance and SEO, ease-of-use and design.


Setup tutorials are part of the demo blog.


Features:

  • â 100/100 Lighthouse performance
  • â SEO-friendly with canonical URLs and OpenGraph data (automatically generated)
  • â Sitemap support
  • â RSS Feed support
  • â Markdown & MDX support
  • â Pagination
  • â Syntax highlighting (+ copy button)
  • â Dark and light mode with toggle button or auto-detect
  • â Search included
  • â Tags for posts
  • â Super easy to deploy as a static site
  • â Includes some prebuilt components for you to use
  • â comments and likes with bluesky
